item.title: Trump tariffs live updates: China to impose 34% tariff on all US goods
item.description: Fallout continues after President Donald Trump's unveiling of severe tariffs against virtually all U.S. trading partners.

item.title: Senators introduce bipartisan bill to limit Trump on tariffs

item.title: Scientists sue NIH, HHS, RFK Jr. over termination of research grants
item.description: Researchers who had millions of dollars' worth of grants terminated by the National Institutes of Health are suing the federal government.

item.title: Trump admin live updates: National Security Agency chief and deputy director fired
item.description: "For $5 million, this can be yours," he said, adding that he was the "first buyer."

item.title: Republicans moving ahead with Trump's 'big' bill of tax breaks and spending cuts
item.description: After a long wait, the Senate is launching action on President Donald Trump’s ”“big, beautiful bill” of tax breaks and spending cuts
